data.title: Verizon Fios TV Guide, Channel Lineup and Listing
data.meta_description: The Fios channel lineup includes 645 all-digital channels and 190,000+ On Demand titles. With that kind of non-stop entertainment, you’ll never be bored again.
data.text:
The ultra reliable Verizon network offers a variety of internet options for all your bandwidth needs - from superfast Fios Internet and 5G Home Internet to Verizon High Speed Internet. And with the impressive HD picture quality of Fios TV, your entertainment will never look the same.

Internet and TV are so interconnected these days with streaming entertainment, video conferencing and gaming, that you need a powerful network to keep up. Combine the best of Fios and connect to everything you love.

Fios, the 100% fiber-optic network delivers streaming at its best with the incredible speeds of Fios Internet -- up to 940/880 Mbps. You can even subscribe to YouTube TV through Fios and experience the ultimate in live TV streaming with over 70 channels, including local news and sports.

Game more and wait less with the screaming-fast download speeds (up to 940 Mbps) of Fios Gigabit Connection . With Verizon internet, you’ll gain big-time bandwidth for virtually uninterrupted solo and multiplayer gaming.
